app_name: Story Publisher Advantage (SPadv) au Mchapishaji wa Hadithi.
welcome_to_story_producer: karibu kwa Story Publisher (Mchapishaji wa hadithi)
please_create_and_then_select_folder: tafadhali unda na uchague folda, ihitjikayo kwa maonyesho.
registration_exit_message: una uhakika unataka kutoka usajili? mabadiliko yako haijahifadhiwa.
registration_skip_message: una hakika unataka kuruka usajili? usiwe na shaka, tutahifahi chenye kiko.
registration_submit_incomplete_message: umewacha nafasi tupu. endelea na kutuma?
registration_error_message: tafadhali toa anwani ya barua pepe ya hifadhidata
rename_title_wordlinks: Andika tafsiri ya kinyume au andika jina katika lugha yako.
consultant_password_message: tafadhali ingiza neno la siri la mshauri:
stories_not_found_body: hakuna mpangilio wa hadithi umepatikana. katika folda iliyoko katika mpangilio wa hadhithi hauna mipangilio mengine. chagua kwa umakini SP mpangilio folda - huwa inapatikana SD kadi.
welcome_screen_select_template_folder_ne:
mtayarishaji wa hadhithi ni tofauti na programu ya kawiada lazima kwanza uunde folda kwenye SD kadi mahali kwenye faili ambako mpangilio huo wa hadithi unaeza kupakua.
(If Kama SD yako imetayarishika tafadhali ruka -chagua 'SP mpangilio' Folda-)

kutayarisha SD kadi yako...
workspace_selection_help:
mwambie mutayarishaji wa hdhithi akuonyeshe kwenye templates.

skrini ifwatayo itakuwa ya 'folda'.
tembea SP Templates folder (on the SD Card), then tap SELECT at the bottom.
only_demo_present: Ili kupakua violezo zaidi vya hadithi au kufikia chaguo zingine, fungua menyu kuu (gonga aikoni ya mistari-3 kwenye kona ya juu kushoto). Tafadhali kamilisha kwanza na uwasilishe Usajili. Asante.
send_message_down: ujumbe uliotuma haupatikani kwa sasa. tafadhali jaribu ten baadaye.
audio_Send_Failed: kuna shida , jarinu kutuma tena audio hiyo
queue_status_message_get: hakuna mawasiliano: siezi vumbua ujumbe mpywa
queue_status_register: hakuna mawasiliano: usajili uko katika mstari wa kupokelewa
fill_with_audio_comment: jaza faili hii kwakutumia maoni katika nia ya audio
template_space_message:
Ni bora kuwa na nafasi ya 1GB kwa kila kiolezo cha hadithi ambacho utakuwa unashughulikia. Ikiwa una nafasi ndogo kuliko hiyo, huenda programu isiweze kuchakata kazi yako na kuhamisha video zako.

Nafasi inayopatikana:
learn_phase_practice: iongee hadhithi yote katika ligha yenu!
learn_phase_overwrite: unahakika unataka kuandika rekodingi za sasa
wordlink_submit_backtranslation_hint: neno kwa neno katika lugha rejeshi/ transliteration
wordlinks_csv_read_error: kusoma kosa kupitia kiungo cha neno CSV faili
wordlinks_json_read_error: kusoma kosa kupitia kiungo cha neno JSON faili

Using:
voice_studio_edit_text_hint: andika hadhithi ukitumia maneno katika video.
overwrite_video_message: Faili moja au zaidi za video zilizochaguliwa tayari zipo kwenye folda ya kunakili. Je, ungependa kubatilisha faili?
copy_folder_not_found_message: Folda ya kunakili haikupatikana. Je, ungependa kubainisha mpya?
backup_warning: ONYO: Hadithi moja au zaidi zilizochaguliwa za kufuta hazijachelezwa katika folda ya chelezo.
use_backup_folder_message: Hifadhi nakala za hadithi zilizochaguliwa kwenye folda:
backup_folder_not_found_message: Folda mbadala haikupatikana. Je, ungependa kupata au kuunda mpya? Kumbuka: Inapendekezwa kuhifadhi faili zako kwenye hifadhi ya nje ikiwezekana.
overwrite_backup_title: OJe, ungependa kufuta faili za Hifadhi Nakala?
overwrite_backup_message: Hadithi moja au zaidi zilizochaguliwa tayari zipo kwenye folda ya nakala. Je, ungependa kubatilisha faili za hadithi?
overwrite_backup_message_single_file: Hadithi ya chelezo iliyochaguliwa tayari ipo kwenye folda ya nakala. Je, ungependa kubatilisha faili za hadithi?
overwrite_story_message: Hadithi iliyochaguliwa ya kurejesha tayari ipo kwenye folda ya nafasi ya kazi. Je, ungependa kubatilisha faili za hadithi?
invalid_story_message: The selected story is not a valid story.  Please select another one.
read_only_message: Imeshindwa kufungua hadithi kwa sababu ni ya kusomwa tu. Je, kuna tatizo na hifadhi ya nje kwenye kifaa chako? Jaribu kuwasha upya kifaa chako.
wsbt_alert_text: tafadhali rekodi utafsiri wa kila slaidi
transcript_hint: Ukiombwa, chapa tafsiri ya nyuma hapa.
remote_check_msg_no_connection: anagalia internet yako na utume tena.
remote_check_msg_failed: huduma z ujumbe ziko chini jaribu baadaye
recording_toolbar_error_recording: kuna makosa katika kurekodi. rekodi tena!
Text_In_Filename_Placeholder: andika kichwa cha hadhithi ya kikwenu hapa

export_no_filename: andika anwani fupi ya hadithi , juu
export_location_exists_message: faili uliyobadilisha tayari iko. je wataka kubadilisha?
export_cancel_comment: usitoke katika kioo hiki mpaka video ikamilike.

LS_prompt: Katika ukurasa huu, tunga na urekodi wimbo kwa ajili ya hadithi ya Biblia! Au, uliza maswali ya majadiliano kuhusu hadithi. Unaweza kuchagua kujumuisha au kutenga ukurasa huu unapokamilisha video.
scanning_sp_templates: tafadhali subiri SP to ianagalie mpangilio

invalid_response: Jibu lisilo sahihi. Imeshindwa kupakia sauti
license_body:
The Story Publisher Adv (SPadv) software is jointly copyrighted © 2022, Tyndale Bible Translators and Robin Rempel. Adapted from and built upon original, Story Producer (version 3.0.6) jointly copyrighted © 2020, SIL International and Cedarville University. 

 It is released under the following license: Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person lawfully obtaining a copy of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to use and redistribute the software, to build and distribute videos from text and audio-visual data, provided that they are the owner of the data or have permission to distribute it. 

 The Software is protected by international copyright treaty provisions. No person may remove any copyright or other proprietary notice from the software nor reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble the software. 

 The software is provided "as is", without warranty of any kind, express or implied, including but not limited to the warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose and noninfringement. In no event shall the authors or copyright holders be liable for any claim, damages or other liability, whether in an action or contract, tort or otherwise, arising from, out of or in connection with the software or the use or other dealings in the software. 

 Data is collected whenever the user submits registration info. All the information that the user types into the registration fields, plus phone type, is collected and used by the remote consultant in assisting and communicating with the user.
